short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power your Workflow with Custom GPTs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Awesome GPTs Chrome Extension" is an innovative tools to embed Custom GPTs into your daily workflow.

Features:
🚀 Send your selected text to your favorite Custom GPTs by context menu
📌 Pin your favorite GPT for easy access as needed
💬 Instantly search GPT within ChatGPT web site (Cmd + G to raise up the search box)
🔍 Search GPTs based on your you web page context
🌐 Search GPTs while using Google Search

Custom GPTs is the future, each GPTs is a solution, so let GPT smoothly empower your workflow smoothly.
